titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place of holding court for the District of Arizona.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 7/28/2005--Introduced. Amends the federal judicial code to add Flagstaff as a location where court will be held for the District of Arizona.
